history.message: Merge branch 'new-feature'
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Track per-problem completion in tutorial progress
history.description:
- Introduces a completedProblems array to LLMProblem records and updates progress logic to track individual problem completion.
- Updates UI components and context to reflect granular progress, adds event-based refresh for history
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Add tutorial progress tracking and record clearing
history.description:
- Implements tutorial progress tracking with status display, filtering, and automatic updates.
- Adds a 'clear all records' feature with confirmation dialog in the history panel.
- Refactors tutorial record saving to fix data issues and ensures TypeScript type safety.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix: B+ tree key handling and parent update logic
history.description:
- Corrected key comparison in BPlusTreeCore search
- Improved parent key update logic in BPlusTreeAlgorithm to handle edge cases when deleting keys.
- Also removed redundant numKeys manipulations for consistency.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Implement B+ tree node type management and persistent storage
history.description:
- Added node type tracking in CommandExecutor to differentiate between leaf and internal nodes.
- Introduced setNodeType method to set node type information.
- Updated executeCreateBTreeNode to utilize node type information for node creation.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Complete the scaffolding of the revised B + tree using the idea of instruction sequence
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(nodeFactory): Added drag and drop recognition for weak entities
history.description:
- Added support for initializing weak entities;
- Modified the style of the model that opens the ER graph list
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: chore: Enhance ERDiagram drag, drop, and connect UX
history.description:
- Centralizes drag-and-drop and connection logic into the ERDiagram component,
- Updates context methods to async for persistence, improves handle visibility and interactivity in EntityNode and DiamondNode
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(createNewDiagram): Enhance ER diagram UI and context logic
history.description:
- Improved EntityListView to support dynamic data type parameters and better badge styling.
- Refactored NewDiagramModal to use createNewDiagram for simplified logic.
- Updated OpenDiagramModal to rely on context-managed diagram list
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: refactor  Inspector and Views
history.description:
- Moved EntitiesView and RelationshipsView to separate components
- Updated Inspector component to use new views.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: refactor(Inspector): use MUI component
history.description:
- Replaces Ant Design components with Material UI in the ERDiagram Inspector and related UI
-  Also updates global and sidebar CSS variables, adjusts NavBar tab styles, and tweaks loading delay in layout.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(PropertyEditor): Add ER graph node editing and indexDB storage
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(weak type): Add weak entity and weak relationship rendering support
history.description:
- Implemented support for weak entities and weak relationships  in ER diagrams.
- Added a new weak entity test page and sample data, updated ERDiagram types, node components, and styles to visually distinguish weak entities and relationships.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Add drag-and-drop to ER diagram canvas and context actions
history.description:
- Implemented drag-and-drop support for adding entities and relationships from the component library to the ER diagram canvas.
- Added utility functions for node creation and drop position calculation.
- Extended ERDiagramContext with add, update, and delete actions for entities and relationships.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(er-diagram): scaffold ER diagram module with basic layout and components
history.description: Introduces a new ER diagram module with interactive visual modeling, including Canvas, Sidebar, Inspector, and context-based state management.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: refactor(ERDiagram): adjusted cardinality and layout logic
history.description:
- Standardized cardinality notation in ER types and data to (min..max) format, removed isForeignKey
- Refactored erToFlow layout to use a fixed 3-column approach and simplified edge handle assignment based on entity position.
- DiamondNode now supports both source and target handles on all sides for improved connection flexibility.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(ERDiagram): Add ER diagram visualization components
history.description:
- Introduced a new ER diagram visualization feature with custom React Flow nodes and edges for entities and relationships.
- Added demo page, reusable ERDiagram component, custom node styles (entity and diamond), edge types, and sample ER data.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Add adjustable B+ tree order and animation
history.description:
- The visualizer layout is refactored.
- The B+ tree logic is refactored to support dynamic order changes, improved animation step sequencing
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: style(BPlusTreeVisualizer): Enhance B+ tree visualizer with custom controls and UI improvements
history.description:
- Added custom zoom and reset controls to the B+ tree visualizer using a new horizontal button panel.
- Improved node layout logic for better alignment.
- Error messages now use Ant Design's message component for better user feedback.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: add SettingsPanel component for animation settings and remove SimpleDemo component
history.description:
- Introduced a new SettingsPanel component to manage animation settings including enabling/disabling animations and adjusting animation speed.
- Removed the SimpleDemo component which was previously handling B+ tree visualization.
- Updated utility functions to accommodate changes in B+ tree structure and added order property to node data.
- Implemented a comprehensive B+ tree class with methods f...
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: refactor : B+ tree visualizer node layout and styles
history.description:
- Simplified and unified the slot-based layout for both internal and leaf B+ tree nodes
- Updated CSS to use slot containers and modernized node appearance
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: add(BPlusXyflow): Complete scaffolding file for B + tree visualization
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(themeToggle): Enhance UI components with theme support and improved styling
history.description:
- Updated TableNavigator to include a search input with an icon and custom styles.
- Added TupleViewer.module.css for styling the TupleViewer component.
- Modified TupleViewer to use new styles and improved background color.
- Refactored NavBar.module.css to use CSS variables for background and border colors.
- Updated SideBar.module.css to apply theme variables for consistent styling.
- Introduce...
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(TableNavigator & share):  A table navigation  to quickly locate tables; new share for File-mediated database interaction patterns
history.description:
- Added TableNavigator component to provide the function of searching and locating tables;
- Added the sharing function of sharing database resources by exporting and importing files
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(DatabaseFlow): Enhance constraint icon and prompt box style, optimize foreign key display
history.description:
- Add constraint icons and prompt boxes to provide details for primary and foreign keys
- Update foreign key reference information to ensure table names are displayed correctly
- Modify styles to improve user experience and ensure prompt boxes are displayed above nodes
- Update database type definitions to support new foreign key structures
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(loading&Databaseflow): Skeleton diagram effect , Better schema foreign key display, Supplement the schema of the textbook.
history.description:
- Use the Skeleton component of MUI to design animation effects of loading state
- Add style selection of edges with foreign key constraints to provide more appropriate fold lines for complex schemas
- The schema of the implementation textbook imported from the database system
- Handle implicit join (Cartesian product)
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: style: Improve the display of schema and changelog page
history.description:
- improve the style of database files, set the appropriate animation time for scaling transformations
 - improve the card display of changelog (add detailed description)
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(sqlCompletionProvider):  Improve the complete settings: .Define relevant keywords according to the context.
history.description:
- Use sortText to control the sorting of suggestion items, - Separate the floating prompt into a component for easy maintenance separately from the completion prompt
- Avoid typing meaningless spaces to trigger the completion prompt
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: docs(README)
history.description:
- Modify the readme documentation according to the updated content
- Added a link to deepwiki
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat: Support for having and limiting queries; enhancement of floating hints
history.description:
- support for limit and offset functions, limiting the number of queries
- (evaluateExpression) fix queries where simple conditions
- handle having conditions
- modify suspended prompts to English, while wrapping according to the md format of the momaco editor,
 - modify prompt rules, support multiple word prompts
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(sqlExecutor): Support for processing nested subqueries in from and where
history.description:
- Processing nested subqueries: Extract the actual subquery AST from subqueryClause.expr.ast, using the subquery results as the data source for external queries
- Support processing of nested subqueries in from and where
 - Special handling is required for join clauses containing subqueries
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(handleNaturalJoin):  Correct handling of natural join
history.description:
- Since node-sql-parser cannot handle natural joins directly, retrieve the sql statement, manually modify the on property in ast if there is a natural join, and then continue execution as an inner join.
- Update the return interface in the type
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(queryHelpers): Group and order operations
history.description:
- Fixed an issue with group by when there is an alias
 - Fixed an issue where order by could not recognize the alias
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(queryHelpers):  Support for basic join operations
history.description:
- Supports basic join operations; ensures that the schema's table is dragged and dropped at the highest level.
- Displays null values instead of rendering them as "null" in the resulting table.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(sqlEditor): Style adjustment and error handling of code editing areas
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(sqlExecutor & sqlEditor): Added aggregate function support for the SQL execution engine
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(ShareLink): Add ShareButton component for sharing database links
history.description:
- Enhance date formatting with error handling
-  Implement data import from shared links
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(Tutorial): Added pre-basic exercises
history.description:
- Sidebar has added the function of initialization tutorial;
- Improved the style of history entries, and added tags for distinction.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: fix(changeLog): Add the ability to generate git information and update related interfaces
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: docs(GuidingModal):
history.description:
- Modified the deployment instructions in the README.
- Added the content of the help module. Temporarily removed the log page.
history.author: ffy6511

history.message: feat(navBar):changelog page & Sidebar updated
history.description:
- Added a changelog page to display recent commit records
- Feature update for the sidebar.

history.author: ffy6511

history.description: - Added management context for switching scenarios such as questions Clear the input area and render area.
